dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
L. Shen
L. Tian
S. Wang
J. Wang
Q. Tian
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for person re-identification containing 32,668 labeled images of 1,501 identities collected from 6 cameras, with a training set of 12,936 images from 751 identities and a gallery of 19,732 images.
dcterms:title: Market-1501

dcterms:creator: E. Ristani
F. Solera
R. Zou
R. Cucchiara
C. Tomasi
dcterms:description: A dataset for multi-target, multi-camera tracking containing 36,411 labeled images of 1,404 identities collected from 8 cameras, with a training set of 16,522 images from 702 identities.
dcterms:title: DukeMTMC-reID

dcterms:creator: W. Li
R. Zhao
T. Xiao
X. Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 14,096 images of 1,467 identities, with each identity captured from two cameras. The dataset is used in two settings: labeled bounding boxes and DPM detected bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: CUHK03
